title: AI Engineer & Android Developer
description: A freelance Android developer with 5+ years of experience in building scalable and high-performance mobile applications. Holds a professional master's degree in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science. Consistently delivers high-quality work on time, efficiently managing related tasks. Additionally, knowledgeable in DevOps processes.
My expertise spans across mobile development, artificial intelligence, data science, DevOps engineering and data engineering, allowing me to build comprehensive solutions from concept to deployment.
